text: Issa (Yesu), mwene Mariyamu (Mariya) aravuga ati "Mana Nyagasani wacu! Tumanurire ameza avuye mu ijuruateguyeho amafunguro, munsi) utubere umunsi mukuru kuri (uwo twe no ku bazaza nyuma yacu, (ayo meza) anatubere igitangaza kiguturutseho (gishimangira ubutumwa bwanjye), unadufungurire kuko ari wowe uhebuje mu batanga amafunguro
